data.prayer: Father, bless the state of KwaZulu-Natal with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of KwaZulu-Natal.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Swahili people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of KwaZulu-Natal to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.section_summary:
the state of KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa has a population of 10,154,500.

We estimate KwaZulu-Natal has 2,134,516 people who might know Jesus, 5,690,287 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,329,696 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
